location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'INDEX MAP to ROUTES IN PERSIA Vol. I.'

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: Printed in colour on paperDimensions: 728 x 434mm, on sheet 830 x 530mm

mods.abstract: The map is a General Staff India publication marked for official use only, and accompanies Routes in Persia. (Volume I.) (Khorasan and Sistan.).The map shows a region of northern and eastern Persia, indicating routes described in the volume, cities, towns, roads, tracks and paths. Numbers and letters identify the corresponding Survey of India sheets, and a note about road conditions appears at bottom left.The map was printed by the Simla Drawing Office, Survey of India, and includes a printing statement which reads 'S.D.O.S.I. No 5376. June 28.'.

name.namePart: Simla Drawing Office, General Staff, India
